tutorial.speak:
Welcome to the Chums Account setup tutorial. We'll guide you through setting up your church's account and configuring it for check-ins.
First, go to the Chums Account website. If you already have an account, you can skip ahead to step 9. To begin, click on Get Started.
On the registration page, fill out your church's information in the provided form fields.
After submitting the registration, check your email. You'll find a link to set your password - click on it.
Create and confirm your password, then click Sign In. The system will prompt you to search for your church.
If your church isn't found in the search results, look for the "Register a New Church" option and click it.
A confirmation dialog will appear - select OK to proceed with registering your church.
Fill in all the required information about your church. Don't modify the subdomain field - leave it as is.
Now that you're logged in, let's set up your check-in system. Start by adding people who will be checking in.
Use the search function to find existing members. For new people, enter their first and last name and click ADD.
To edit someone's information, click the pencil icon next to their name.
Add detailed information, including family members. Find the household section, click the edit pencil, and save your changes.
Continue adding family members using the add person icon as needed.
Next, set up your attendance structure. Click the attendance icon to begin.
Add a campus by clicking the plus icon, then name your campus.
Create a new service by clicking Add Service and give it a name.
Set up your service times by clicking Add Service Time and entering the times.
Now let's configure groups. Click on groups and use the plus sign to add new ones.
Create all necessary groups for your church. Remember, you can organize them by category by including the category name before the group name.
To configure a group, select its name and click the edit button.
Click the edit pencil to access detailed group settings.
Configure your check-in settings. Enable attendance tracking if needed, and set up parent pickup if you want to print both kid and parent tags.
Finally, assign service times to your groups. Select the appropriate times and click Add to complete the setup.
